name: Funds spent for business R&D performed in the United States, by state and source of funds: 2019
description: Funds spent for business R&D performed in the United States, by state and source of funds: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Beginning in survey year 2018, companies that performed or funded less than $50,000 of R&D were excluded from tabulation. These companies in aggregate represented a very small share of total R&D expenditures in prior years. Had the companies under this threshold been included in the 2018 estimates, they would have contributed approximately $90 million to overall R&D expenditures. Excludes data for federally funded research and development centers.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Enterprise Research and Development Survey, 2019.
